title: Dare to Scare
description: Dear Diary, Ashley is so lucky. She's "in" with the older girls! They say I can be part of the group, too ... but you'll never believe what they want me to do first! -- Mary-Kate Dear Diary, Awesome news! the coolest girls in the entire school want me to hang with them and help put together their Halloween party this year! Here's the not-so-awesome Mean Dana Woletsky thinks only she should be friends with the cool girls. And she'll do whatever it takes to keep me out of their group! -- Ashley
author: Judy Katschke
